title: The Beatles Anthology 7. June 1967 to July 1968
creator_credit: Geoff Wonfor, Chipps Chipperfield, Picture Music International, EMI/Parlophone and Apple
brief_description: It is the Summer of Love, and those whom Timothy Leary has called the “avatars” sing All You Need is Love on black and white television on the first world satellite television program. Episode 5 starts with the leadup to All You Need Is Love, George visits Haight-Ashbury, meditation and the maharishi, Brian Epstein dies, Brian Epstein montage to You’ve Got Hide Your Love Away out-take, making of Magical Mystery Tour [308785], opening the Apple Boutique, the trip to India, the Beatles with ukulele, James Taylor, The Iveys (Badfinger), Mary Hopkins, film from the White Album sessions, Yellow Submarine, the movie and Beatles cameo, Yoko Ono. Other songs include All You Need Is Love broadcast, colourised, Fool On The Hill, Your Mother Should Know, I Am The Walrus, Ed Sullivan intro to Hello Goodbye promo film, Across The Universe out-take montage, Lady Madonna promo film, All Together Now, While My Guitar Gently Weeps demo.
